mapper.sql: SELECT data.num, data.roleName AS roleName FROM(
mapper.select: select getSysOrgChildList(${orgId}) as ORGIDS from dual
SELECT CONCAT(t.ID,'') ID from sys_org t where t.PARENT_IDS like CONCAT('%/',#{orgId},'/%')

SELECT COUNT(*) AS num, r.role_name AS roleName
FROM jbpm4_task jt ,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE jt.assignee_=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ru.target_type='user' AND r.validate_state='1' AND u.validate_state='1'
FROM jbpm4_task jt ,sys_role_user ru,sys_org_user ou,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE jt.assignee_=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND u.id=ou.user_id AND ru.target_type='user' AND r.validate_state='1' AND u.validate_state='1'
GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS num, r.role_name AS roleName
FROM jbpm4_hist_task ht ,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ht.assignee_=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ht.state_='completed' AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
FROM jbpm4_hist_task ht,sys_org_user ou ,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ht.assignee_=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ht.state_='completed' AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1' AND u.id=ou.user_id
GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS num, r.role_name AS roleName
FROM jbpm4_biz_tab bt,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE bt.start_pro_userid=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
FROM jbpm4_biz_tab bt,sys_org_user ou,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE bt.start_pro_userid=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1' AND u.id=ou.user_id
GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT AVG(ht.duration_) AS num, r.role_name AS roleName
FROM jbpm4_hist_task ht,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ht.assignee_=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ht.state_='completed' AND ru.target_type='user' AND ht.DURATION_>=11500 AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
FROM jbpm4_hist_task ht,sys_org_user ou,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ht.assignee_=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ht.state_='completed' AND ru.target_type='user' AND ht.DURATION_>=11500 AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1' AND u.id=ou.user_id
GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY AVG(ht.duration_) ASC

SELECT AVG(ht.duration_) AS num, r.role_name AS roleName
FROM jbpm4_hist_task ht,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ht.assignee_=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ht.state_='completed' AND ru.target_type='user' AND ht.DURATION_>=11500 AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
FROM jbpm4_hist_task ht,sys_org_user ou,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ht.assignee_=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ht.state_='completed' AND ru.target_type='user' AND ht.DURATION_>=11500 AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1' AND u.id=ou.user_id
GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY AVG(ht.duration_) DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS num, r.role_name AS roleName
FROM jbpm4_consigned_task ct,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ct.from_user_id=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
FROM jbpm4_consigned_task ct,sys_org_user ou,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ct.from_user_id=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.id=ou.user_id AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS num, r.role_name AS roleName
FROM jbpm4_consigned_task ct,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ct.to_user_id=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
FROM jbpm4_consigned_task ct,sys_org_user ou,sys_role_user ru,sys_user u,sys_role r WHERE ct.to_user_id=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.id=ou.user_id AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT data.num, data.roleName AS roleName FROM(
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num, r.role_name AS roleName
FROM jbpm4_consigned_task ct,sys_user u,sys_role r ,sys_role_user ru WHERE ct.from_user_id=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
FROM jbpm4_consigned_task ct,sys_org_user ou,sys_user u,sys_role r ,sys_role_user ru WHERE ct.from_user_id=u.user_no AND ru.target_id=u.id AND ru.role_id=r.id AND ru.target_type='user' AND u.id=ou.user_id AND u.validate_state='1' AND r.validate_state='1'
GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC ) data WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
